comment:
* Information when removing a starting window of a particular task.
 * @hide

variables.name: windowAnimationLeash
variables.comment:
* The animation container layer of the top activity.
     * @hide

variables.name: mainFrame
variables.comment:
* The main window frame for the window of the top activity.
     * @hide

variables.name: playRevealAnimation
variables.comment:
* Whether need to play reveal animation.
     * @hide

variables.name: DEFER_MODE_DEFAULT
variables.comment: The mode is default defer removing the snapshot starting window.

variables.name: DEFER_MODE_NORMAL
variables.comment: The mode to defer removing the snapshot starting window until IME has drawn.

variables.name: DEFER_MODE_ROTATION
variables.comment:
* The mode to defer the snapshot starting window removal until IME drawn and finished the
     * rotation.

variables.name: DEFER_MODE_NONE
variables.comment: The mode is no need to defer removing the snapshot starting window.

variables.name: deferRemoveMode
variables.comment:
* Whether need to defer removing the snapshot starting window.
     * @hide

methods.name: public void writeToParcel(@NonNull Parcel dest, int flags)

methodNames: public void writeToParcel(@NonNull Parcel dest, int flags)
